abstract: General Electric will team up with Cinelan to make 30 three-minute films by well-known directors, including Morgan Spurlock.
snippet: General Electric will team up with Cinelan to make 30 three-minute films by well-known directors, including Morgan Spurlock.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — General Electric just can’t stay away from the movies. Barely eight months after ceding control of NBC Universal and its Universal Studios to Comcast, G.E. is diving into the documentary world as the financial backer of 30 three-minute films by directors including Morgan Spurlock (“POM Wonderful Presents: The Greatest Movie Ever Sold”), Joe Berlinger (“Crude”), Barbara Kopple (“Shut Up and Sing”) and Alex Gibney (“Magic Trip: Ken Kesey’s Search for a Kool Place”).

headline.main: G.E. to Produce Short Films About Innovation
